question: Who will be conferred with the 2016 Dada Saheb Phalke award?
explanation: Kasinadhuni Viswanath has been named for the prestigious 2016 Dada Saheb Phalke award for his outstanding contribution to the film industry. He is icon in the film industry and known for classical and traditional art, music and dance. The award will be conferred by President Pranab Mukherjee at a function on May 3 at Vigyan Bhawan in New Delhi. The award carries a golden lotus, a cash prize of Rs 10 lakhs and a shawl.
